title: How to Invest Your First $20 for F You Money
subtitle: Learn the essential steps to start your investing journey and build substantial wealth.
content:
How to Invest Your First $20 for F You Money

I'm Tyler, a former financial advisor and portfolio manager. Now I spend most of my time working on my new podcast, Your Money Guide on the Side. Check it out by clicking the link in my bio.

1. Buy a Book

Go buy a copy of J.L. Collins' The Simple Path to Wealth.

2. Read It

Now read it. I see you.

3. Put It Into Practice

Put it into practice, particularly the section on how to simplify your investments through one index fund that can solve 99% of our problems.

4. Listen to the Podcast

And if you truly hate reading and you prefer listening, I've got good news! I got to interview J.L. Collins this week on the podcast, and you can learn all you need to know about investing for the rest of your life in 30 minutes by tuning into the podcast by clicking the link in my bio.
